CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 28, 1957, pg. A10, reads: "'The Hostesses With The Mostest' - A quintet of Pittsburgh's smartest and best dressed young women gave a suave and brilliant cocktail party Sunday at the Penn Sheraton Hotel for a select group of friends. Here the 'hostesses with the mostest' pose in their exciting hostess slacks, some trimmed with mink, some with fox and others merely created of lavish lace and satin.  Seated: Gloria Grate, Nellie Barron and Ruby Young.  Standing: Laynee Jones and Gay DeHall. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of five D. I. Club members: Laynee Jones, Ruby Young Buchanan, Nellye Barron, Gloria Golden Grate, Gay DeHall, gathered around buffet table in Penn Sheraton hotel for cocktail party, another version
